title: Pixel 4a - Phone does not vibrate for incoming calls (but does vibrate for texts and notifications).
content:
Pixel 4a - Phone does not vibrate for incoming calls (but does vibrate for texts and notifications).
Factory reset did not work.  I've noticed that phone will vibrate for calls only if display is on. If phone is locked then phone will not vibrate for incoming calls (it will display that there is incoming call but not vibrate).
